desc: All my creations are one of a kind handmade with love and special attention to detail as I want them to last for many years to come. I do my best to give a full description of the items listed and a full customer satisfaction with a positive feedback is of high importance to me. Home decor and table decor are my love!

layout.text: Wreaths by Jolanta is pleased to offer these one-of-a-kind creations!
